مقابلة مع مصطفى محمد
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jews--Palestine--1930-1950
Palestine--History--Arab rebellion, 1936-1939
Palestine--Zionist colonization--History--To 1948
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Education; Jāḥūlā (Palestine); Religious schooling; Schools; Socio-economic conditions; Weddings; Work; British Mandate of Palestine, 1922-1948; Dabkah; Dalʻūnā; Dwellings; Farmers; Intervillage relations; Irrigation; Jāḥūlā (Palestine); Land ownership; Mayors; Means of transportation; Muslims; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Prayers; Rituals; Social relations; Trenches; Weddings; Work; Border guards; British authorities; British-Jewish relations; Checkpoints; Collaborationists; Jewish settlements; Jews; Killing; Land purchase; Land sale; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Revolutionaries; Weapon acquisition; Zionist invasion of Palestine, 1948

oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSFAR: عز الدين، احمد (مدرّس); الفتّاح، عبد (مدرّس); شحادة، موسى (شيخ).
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on December 7, 2004 with Muṣṭafá Muḥammad, male, born in 1925, in Jāḥūlā, Palestine.He was a trench digger.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع مصطفى محمد في 7 كانون الأول ديسمبر عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في الجحولة، فلسطين. كان حفّار خنادق.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Disputes and relations with the jews. (@ 27:28)
